title: Canton Townhouse for Lease - 3 bed, 1.5 bath
map_address: 2006 W. Franklin near Ford Road and Sheldon
posting_body: townhouse condo w/ 3 bedrooms, 1.5 bathroom, full (unfinished but super clean basement).
Living room has walk out doorwall to cement patio leading to spacious common areas of complex.
Lots of room to enjoy outdoors in desirable Hidden Glen condo complex.
This unit has a Private Entrance with carport steps from the entry.
The monthly rent INCLUDES the condo assn fee which covers water, landscaping, trash and snow removal of parking lot and sidewalks.
This owner just completed a $17,000 renovation consisting of all new paint on all three floors, new interior doors, trim and door hardware, new light fixtures.
new gas stove, kitchen countertop, kitchen sink & faucet.
The 1st floor has all new luxury vinyl plank flooring.
Appliances include refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, washer & gas dryer.
Small dogs (only) considered on a case by case basis with non refundable pet deposit & additional monthly fee.
$50.00 non refundable application fee per adult, Security Deposit = 1.5 x monthly rent, $400 clean fee due @ move in.
Owner will run criminal background on all adults, who must execute lease.
Tenant to provide current Credit Karma credit reports.
Great location close to schools, shopping & freeways!
Please schedule your showing now; we don't expect this super clean unit to last long in desirable Plymouth Canton Schools!
